front.title: An IANA Registry for Protocol Uses of Data with the DNS TXT RRTYPE

abstract.t: Some protocols use the RDATA field of the DNS TXT RRTYPE for holding data to be parsed, rather than for unstructured free text. This document specifies the creation of an IANA registry for protocol- specific structured data to minimize the risk of conflicting or inconsistent uses of that RRTYPE and data field.
